dmca.title: Notice of Violation on web site: http://les-seigneurs-du-feu.forumactif.fr
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

 

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

 

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal
<http://www.theplanet.com/legal> .

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


________________________________

From: Eric Bertelemy - WorldBy.Com [mailto:eb@worldby.com] 
Posted At: Thursday, July 27, 2006 8:18 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: Notice of Violation on web site:
http://les-seigneurs-du-feu.forumactif.fr
Subject: Notice of Violation on web site:
http://les-seigneurs-du-feu.forumactif.fr
Importance: High


Empoli (Florence), July the 26th 2006

 

 

 

NEO TELECOM

7, place Ile de Beaute

06300 Nice

postmaster@illimail.com <mailto:postmaster@illimail.com> 

 

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. 
1333 North Stemmons Freeway
Suite 110
75207 Dallas
US

 

 

 

 

Notice of Violation on web site:
http://les-seigneurs-du-feu.forumactif.fr
<http://les-seigneurs-du-feu.forumactif.fr/index.forum> - Order to
Remove material 

 

 

Dear Sir,

 

 

We inform you that the web site
http://les-seigneurs-du-feu.forumactif.fr
<http://les-seigneurs-du-feu.forumactif.fr/index.forum>  contains
elements owned by WorldBy.Com. 

 

We refer to the photograph of Hotel Alchymist you can find at
http://www.pragueby.com/hotelalchymist/images/hotelalchymist_acc5.jpg
<http://www.pragueby.com/hotelalchymist/images/hotelalchymist_acc5.jpg>
that has been copied from PragueBy.Com. Furthermore this element has
been linked to PragueBy.Com, as referred by the elements downloaded from
our server each time a visitor looks at your web page. This infringement
represents a trading abuse for the use of our Internet band.
PragueBy.Com is a website owned by WorldBy.Com S.p.A. 

 

We hereby give notice that you must take down this content within 8 days
of receipt of this letter. If this content is not removed from the web
site, we will immediately commence legal proceedings against your
company and your service provider who will be held responsible for
domain owner violations, in whichever country necessary, in order to
enforce removal of the copyrighted contents from the site and to seek
damages caused by the unauthorised use of them.

 

Sure of your prompt action in complying with the request to remove as
per above from the web site http://les-seigneurs-du-feu.forumactif.fr
<http://les-seigneurs-du-feu.forumactif.fr/index.forum> , we are looking
forwards to your written confirmation of the removal.

 

 

Yours sincerely

 

 
Dr. Stefano Galastri

 
Managing Director

 
WorldBy.Com S.p.A.
